mapper.update: UPDATE t_hot_search SET search_count = search_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE keyword = #{keyword}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_hot_search (keyword, search_count, trend_score, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{keyword}, #{searchCount}, 0, 'active', NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE search_count = search_count + #{searchCount}, update_time = NOW()

UPDATE t_hot_search hs INNER JOIN ( SELECT keyword, COUNT(*) as recent_count,
CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 100 THEN 3.0 WHEN COUNT(*) > 50 THEN 2.0 WHEN COUNT(*) > 10 THEN 1.5 ELSE 1.0 END as new_trend_score
FROM t_search_history
WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{hours} HOUR) GROUP BY keyword
) trend ON hs.keyword = trend.keyword SET hs.trend_score = trend.new_trend_score, hs.update_time = NOW() WHERE hs.status = 'active'
